title: Make vs AutoGluon: Which workflow automation Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Make vs AutoGluon. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best workflow automation tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Make and AutoGluon for your workflow automation needs? Both are popular tools in the AI space, but they have different strengths, pricing models, and use cases. This comprehensive comparison breaks down the key differences to help you make an informed decision.

sections.title: Overview: Make vs AutoGluon
paragraphs: Make is Make (formerly Integromat) is a visual workflow automation platform that simplifies business process automation. In April 2025, Make introduced AI Agents for plain-language instruction-based automation. The platform emphasizes user-friendly experience and reliability for non-technical users.. It's known for workflow-automation, ai-agents, integration.

AutoGluon, on the other hand, is AutoGluon is an open-source AutoML toolkit developed by Amazon that automates the end-to-end machine learning pipeline, from data preprocessing to model deployment. Its key capabilities include robust automated model selection, hyperparameter tuning, and ensembling, with specialized support for tabular, text, and image data. It uniquely targets both practitioners and researchers by offering state-of-the-art performance 'out-of-the-box' while remaining extensible for custom modeling tasks, significantly reducing the expertise and time required to build high-quality ML models.. Users choose it for automl, amazon-aws, tabular-data.

sections.title: Pricing Comparison
paragraphs: When it comes to value for money, consider your specific use case and team size. Make offers a free tier, making it great for getting started.

sections.title: Features & Capabilities
paragraphs: Make excels in: AI Agents for plain-language automation, Visual workflow builder, 400+ app integrations. This makes it ideal for teams that need workflow-automation.

AutoGluon stands out with: Automated model training & hyperparameter tuning for tabular, text, and image data, Advanced multi-layer stacking and ensembling of models for superior accuracy, Seamless integration with popular deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, MXNet). It's particularly strong for users focused on automl.

sections.title: Use Cases: When to Choose Each Tool
paragraphs: Choose Make if: You need workflow-automation, work with ai-agents, or require flexible pricing.
Choose AutoGluon if: You prioritize automl, work in amazon-aws, or prefer their pricing model.

sections.title: Pros & Cons
paragraphs: Make Pros: Verified platform, Featured tool, Highly rated (4.7/5), Extensive feature set.
Make Cons: Some limitations on free tier.
AutoGluon Pros: Verified platform, Highly rated (4.6/5), Comprehensive features.
AutoGluon Cons: May have feature limitations.

verdict: Both Make and AutoGluon are solid choices for workflow automation. Your choice depends on your specific requirements: Make is better for workflow-automation, while AutoGluon excels at automl. Consider trying both with their free tiers or trials to see which fits your workflow better.
